name: CatWiki
intro: Get to know more about your cat breed.

title: About the project
paragraph: Curious about cat breeds? You can search for a specific breed or pick one of four popular varieties. For each individual breed, you can read up on his or her temperament, origin, life span, adaptability, affection level, child-friendly attributes, grooming needs, intelligence, health issues such as common illnesses or conditions such as hair loss or eye problems. If there are social needs and activities like hunting or digging trails or even if it is an affectionate animal to children and strangers alike.

title: How does it work
paragraph: This project uses TheCatAPI and renders the data. The API requests are made using fetch API inside Next.js getStaticProps function, and the index.js and breeds.js pages are generated in this way. Each cat breed page is generated on a server with Next.js getServerSideProps function for styling I was using CSS Modules with support for SCSS.

name: Digital menu
description: Fast loading digital menu for your store with offline support, easily installable on your device and with the support for multiple languages.
